domination.name: Domination Victory
domination.description: Control 64% of the world's total land mass and 64% of its population

space_race.name: Space Race Victory
space_race.description: Build and launch a spaceship to Alpha Centauri

diplomatic.name: Diplomatic Victory
diplomatic.description: Be elected Secretary General of the United Nations

time.name: Time Victory
time.description: Have the highest score when time runs out (2050 AD)

religious.name: Religious Victory
religious.description: Spread your religion to 75% of all cities
